title: Hustlers Star Keke Palmer Spills Her Head-to-Toe Skincare Routine
text:
Let's get one thing clear: Keke Palmer is no newcomer. In fact, she's been out here (my pre-teen self lived for her Nickelodeon days), but she's come a long way since True Jackson, VP. With a career that includes staring in multiple films, releasing albums, and co-hosting Good Morning America, Keke can seemingly conquer anything, including recently garnering her fair share of headlines for her part in the star-studded cast of the most talked-about movie of the year, Hustlers. If you haven’t seen the movie, I won’t spoil it, but let’s just say Keke’s glow-up isn’t just from copious amounts of glitter. Ahead, Keke talks skincare, her impressive career, and of course what it was like to work alongside the one and only Jennifer Lopez.

On the Hustlers cast…

View photos

“I loved all the cast members,” Keke told us, “but I really bonded with my girl Lili Reinhart because we did so much together, and our characters were close in the film. And so she and I actually spent so much time working together on set, plus we’re both Virgos.”

On Jenifer Lopez, specifically…

We're not the only ones impressed by Jenifer Lopez's training for Hustlers—Keke is a fan too. As she stated, “J.Lo’s health routine had me like, Oh, girl. She doesn’t drink or smoke. I wasn’t sure I could commit to that because I like to have a drink sometimes, but that’s why she looks as amazing as she does.”

Her go-to hair product while filming Hustlers…

Keke shared, “For my hair, we really stuck to using pro-style gel. That was my saving grace for my character, Mercedes’s, look.”

View photos

Ampro Style Protein Styling Gel ($4)
